channel.title: Help now!
channel.description: hi please i need ur help some one came on my server and said its going to crash after tht he logged out n another guy logged in called syipkerpk124 and keeps tying loads of letters and now funny fings keep happening please help me. what shall i do?

Copy that and paste it into the the ipban file. The ipban file is located in your data folder.[/quote]

basically what i stated but whatever…[/quote]
Well I edited what i said, so look at it again. ;]

item.title: Help now!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

ry60003333:

You can’t even login to your server. It says Connecting to server… for about 60 seconds and then says Error connecting to server. Your server fails.

He’s asking for help, not to get flamed. he just started, its not like he has no excuse. leo, to ip ban just type ::ipban and then type in the username that you want ip banned. example if you want the user “Test” to be ip banned type in ::ipban Test

That easy. And if that doesnt work your going to have to go into your character folder, find the account that you want ip banned, go into his file, get the ip adress after “last connected from”.
Copy that and paste it into the the ipban file. The ipban file is located in your data folder. (what ziplock said)

Read full topic

item.title: Help now!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

If you don’t want him to be mod or admin simply don’t give it to him. Ip ban him if hes annoying. And no he really can’t do much damage. I guess if you’re afraid he might crash it, you could give him mod. giving him admin gives him the ability to ban other players though. I wouldn’t do that. In my opinion, IP ban sounds like the best solution.

Read full topic

item.title: Help now!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Well the kid is obviously trying to craash your server, and hes doing a poor job. if hes just typing letters, simply do ::ipban syipkpker124. and if you cant get him ip banned that way, place his ip in the ipban folder manually.

Otherwise, if hes making tons of accounts and logging them all in till your server crashes theres nothing you can really do about that. ip ban wont solve it.

If your server crashes don’t worry about it, it does no harm to your computer. It might make a beeping noise or something but thats about it. your runserver will close and all you have to do is open it back up again. But if someone does crash it, i recommend leaving it off for a few minutes till they go away. they’ll get bored after a while and stop.

Read full topic
